DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis study excimer ( 308-nm UVB ) laser add either tazarotene 0.1 % gel acitretin 25 mg daily lead improve efficacy treatment alone . The primary objective study compare improvement psoriatic plaque without excimer laser ( 308-nm UVB ) treatment , apply randomize blinded fashion , subject acitretin 25 mg tazarotene gel 0.1 % QD . The primary endpoint comparison change NPF score plaque treat excimer laser treat sham treatment . The secondary objective compare number excimer light treatment time necessary achieve average lesion assessment score 0 1 subject treat acitretin 25 mg PO tazarotene gel 0.1 % QD , evaluate adverse event related combination study treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Acitretin Tazarotene Gel Excimer Laser Treatment Psoriasis
